channel.title: CVE Feed for ProWCPlugins -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-37217|2024-07-22T09:24:46.174Z -- prowcplugins -- empty%20cart%20button%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ProWCPlugins Empty Cart Button for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Empty Cart Button for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.3.8.
